author: breser
msg: Followup to r1427224: Fix build of svnauthz-validate.

author: breser
msg: svnauthz-validate: Convert some args to UTF-8.
(main): OPT_USERNAME, OPT_PATH and OPT_REPOS all convert to UTF-8.

author: breser
msg: svnauthz-validate: Allow authz files to be validated in transactions.
Adds a second mode to the command that expects a path to a repository and
the fspath within the repository to the authz file when a transaction
(usage): Adjust the usage to reflect the new --transaction mode.
(main): Add new option for the transaction mode, add and init txn and
repos_path to the opts struct, consume the first non-option argument
as the repos_path when a transaction id was passed, disallow
URLs as the authz_file argument when a transaction was passed, and
use get_authz_from_txn() when in transaction mode.
